How many appointments do I have on May 15th, 2024? Please give me a summary of the description for each appointment.

To find the number of appointments you have on May 15th, 2024, and a summary of each appointment, I need to call the `get_day_calendar_events` function. This function will return a list of dictionaries containing information about each meeting on the specified day.

